solution_line_template: There are {num_stories} levels * {spots_per_level} spots = <<{num_stories}*{spots_per_level}={total_possible_spots}>>{total_possible_spots} possible parking spots.
The second level has {first_level_open_spots} open spots + {more_on_second_level} = <<{first_level_open_spots}+{more_on_second_level}={second_level_open_spots}>>{second_level_open_spots} open spots.
The third level has {second_level_open_spots} open spots + {more_on_third_level} = <<{second_level_open_spots}+{more_on_third_level}={third_level_open_spots}>>{third_level_open_spots} open spots.

Total open spots are {first_level_open_spots} + {second_level_open_spots} + {third_level_open_spots} + {fourth_level_open_spots} = <<{first_level_open_spots}+{second_level_open_spots}+{third_level_open_spots}+{fourth_level_open_spots}={total_open_spots}>>{total_open_spots} open spots.
If there are {total_possible_spots} possible spots – {total_open_spots} open spots = <<{total_possible_spots}-{total_open_spots}={total_full_spots}>>{total_full_spots} full spots.
